thread.section_title: Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best place to stay in uganda.
thread.title_full: Best place to stay in uganda. - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: SAVAN P
title: Best place to stay in uganda.
text: What a great experience being in uganda for the first time. I stayed at this resort foe three nights for a workshop. My entire team and myself received service beyond my exoectation. Excellent accommodation with great food and facilities. Resort is beautifully designed with touch of great african heritage. Great place to be at. Highly recommended.
